title: eGROCERY Website
description: Collaborated with four other software engineering students to develop an e-commerce web application that enables users to browse a catalogue of grocery items and purchase them. I primarily worked on the frontend using React, while the backend was implemented using Flask.

title: Auctions Web Application
description: Built a web application to register users and allow them to post or bid for items for auctions entirely in Django.

title: Master's Admissions Predictor
description: Developed a machine learning model to predict the probability of admission for a student to a university based on their profile. The model was trained on a dataset of 500 students and achieved an accuracy of 90%.

title: Single-Page Email Client Web Application
description: Developed a machine learning model to predict the probability of admission for a student to a university based on their profile. The model was trained on a dataset of 500 students and achieved an accuracy of 90%.
